description: Ethiopians are an archer and siege-focused civilization that excels in resource management and ranged unit production.
dark_age: Start with 3 villagers and a scout.
Build a house and a barracks near forests.
Train additional villagers from the town center.
Use the scout to explore the map and find resources.
Advance to Feudal Age at around 20-22 minutes with 500 food and 200 gold.
Have around 800-1000 food, 150-200 wood, and 150-200 gold at the end of the Dark Age.
Assign 4-5 villagers to food, 3-4 to wood, and 1-2 to gold.
feudal_age: Build additional archery ranges and continue producing archers.
Build a market and blacksmith to upgrade archers and sell excess resources for gold.
Advance to Castle Age at around 28-30 minutes with 800 food and 400 gold.
Have around 1500-2000 food, 600-800 wood, and 500-600 gold at the end of the Feudal Age.
Assign 8-10 villagers to food, 6-7 to wood, and 3-4 to gold.
castle_age: Build a siege workshop and start producing siege units.
Research the unique technology, Royal Heirs, to improve the performance of shotel warriors and pikemen.
Advance to Imperial Age at around 35-37 minutes with 1000 food, 1000 gold, and 800 stone.
Have around 3500-4000 food, 2000-2500 wood, and 1200-1500 gold at the end of the Castle Age.
Assign 20-25 villagers to food, 12-15 to wood, and 8-10 to gold.
imperial_age: Train more shotel warriors and upgrade them with the elite version.
Produce siege units and research Siege Onager and Torsion Engines for improved siege performance.
Have a mix of archers and siege units to counter different enemy units.
Research the unique technology, Torsion Engines, for improved siege unit performance.
Assign 40-50 villagers to food, 20-25 to wood, and 16-20 to gold.
